public ref class DesignTimeProviderServicesAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.para: Identifies where to find the design time services for a given database provider. This attribute should be present in the primary assembly of the database provider.
This attribute is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.param: The name of the type that can be used to add the database providers design time services to a . This type should contain a method with the following signature public IServiceCollection ConfigureDesignTimeServices(IServiceCollection serviceCollection).
The name of the assembly that contains the design time services.
The NuGet package name that contains the design time services.
